attributes.action: Make cyclists pay road tax and insurance, and have a licence plate.
attributes.additional_details: A registration number would help convicting cyclists for traffic offences.
attributes.background:
The other day I was stopped at traffic lights.
A cyclist overtook me and went straight through the red light and turned left narrowly missing a car coming from the other direction.
Fortunately there was not an accident but there could have been.

This isn't the first time I've seen this happen.
